columns.name: HLR_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ENTRY_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC instant when a change was made to this Logistics Request's info.

columns.name: ENTRY_USER_ID
columns.description: The user that made the change to this Logistics Request.

columns.name: ENTRY_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: ENTRY_TECH_ID
columns.description: The Logistics Technician that made the change to this Logistics Request.

columns.name: START_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The audit trail for this Logistics Request's start instant (I HLR 115).

columns.name: PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description: The audit trail for this Logistics Request's priority (I HLR 120).

columns.name: START_PLF_ID
columns.description: The audit trail for this Logistics Request's start location (I HLR 125).

columns.name: DYNAMIC_START_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The audit trail for this Logistics Request's dynamic start location type (I HLR 126).

columns.name: END_PLF_ID
columns.description: The audit trail for this Logistics Request's end location (I HLR 130).

columns.name: DYNAMIC_END_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The audit trail for this Logistics Request's dynamic end location type (I HLR 131).

columns.name: TECHS_NUM
columns.description: The audit trail for this Logistics Request's number of required techs (I HLR 135).

columns.name: MODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The audit trail for this Logistics Request's mode (I HLR 140).

columns.name: REGION_SEC_ID
columns.description: The audit trail for this Logistics Request's region (I HLR 240).

columns.name: REGION_SEC_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of this cleaning sector.

columns.name: SECTOR_SEC_ID
columns.description: The audit trail for this Logistics Request's sector (I HLR 241).

columns.name: SECTOR_SEC_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of this cleaning sector.

columns.name: DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The audit trail for this Logistics Request's department (I HLR 242).

columns.name: HOSP_LOC_ID
columns.description: The audit trail for this Logistics Request's hospital location (I HLR 243).

columns.name: SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: The audit trail for this Logistics Request's service area (I HLR 244).

columns.name: PHONE_NUMBER
columns.description: The audit trail for this Logistics Request's phone number (I HLR 260).

columns.name: BED_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The audit trail for this Logistics Request's bed type (I HLR 148).

columns.name: TRIP_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The audit trail indicating this request's trip type. Blank is interpreted as One-Way.
